Html: How come, that Rawr tells me that Gavel of Unearthed Secrets (159 spell dmg) will provide more TPS than Tempest of Chaos (259 spell dmg) ?
The TPS on Gavel of Unearthed Secrets is bugged. Ermad is working on fixing that, and a few other threat-related tankadin bugs, and we hope to have it more polished in b16.
